about.LicenseAgreement: Ta amfani da wannan software, ka yarda da sharuɗan yarjejeniyar lasisin software na Neuralium. Kuna iya duba sabon sigar lasisi na software a:

account.PleaseImportOrCreateWalletAccount: Da fatan za a shigo ko ƙirƙirar asusun walat

verifyAccount.Title: Tabbatar Asusun
verifyAccount.IntroductionText: Don hana cin zarafin, tsarin ƙirƙirar asusun dole ne ya bi wani tabbaci. Ya danganta da inda kake, ana samun zaɓuɓɓuka daban-daban.
verifyAccount.ResultsSuccess: Tabbatarwar nasara ce! asusunka na Id yanzu an tabbatar da shi ta wayar.
verifyAccount.ResultsFailure: Tabbatarwar ta gaza. Kuna iya sake gwadawa cikin awanni 24.
verifyAccount.DefaultHelpText: Anan dole ne a zaɓi hanyar tantancewa tsakanin zaɓin da ake samu. Kowace hanya tana da fa'ida da rashin damuwa. Da fatan za a zabi wanda yake daidai a gare ku.
verifyAccount.TESTNETHelpText: A cikin TESTNET, ana iya kewayewa da tabbaci don ƙirƙirar lissafi kai tsaye.
verifyAccount.AppointmentsHelpText: Zaka fara aikin tabbatar alƙawarin Neuralium. Wannan aikin na iya ɗaukar kwanaki da yawa kuma lallai ne ya kasance don halartar alƙawarinku lokacin da kwanan wata da lokaci suka tabbata. Abvantbuwan amfãni: m.
verifyAccount.THSHelpText: Dole ne ku aiwatar da sa hannun mai wuya mai wahala. Da zarar an kammala, asusunka zai sami damar hakowa a cikin tiers na 1 da na 2 a matsayin Server.

appointments.Title: Tabbatarwa Alkawari
appointments.IntroductionText: An tsara aikin aikin alƙawari don tabbatarwa da ba da izini ga masu amfani da gaskiya yayin kiyaye yawancin ɗumbin ambaliyar daga cikin tsarin.
appointments.RequestAppointmentText: Domin fara aikin, da fatan za a nemi alƙawari. Za'a gabatar da buƙatar alƙawari kuma ya kamata a sami tabbaci a nan gaba. Wannan tsari na iya ɗaukar minti zuwa sa'o'i da yawa.
appointments.PreferredRegion: Da fatan za a zaɓi yankin duniyar da kuka fi so
appointments.OccidentHelp: Yammacin duniya, wannan yankin ya fi mamaye Amurka
appointments.CentralHelp: Yankin tsakiyar duniya, wannan yanki ya fi dacewa musamman Turai, Afirka da Gabas ta Tsakiya
appointments.OrientHelp: Yankin gabashin duniya, wannan yankin ya fi shafar kasar Sin, Indiya, Ostiraliya da duk yankin Asiya
appointments.RequestCompleted: Neman alƙawarin nasara an aika da nasara
appointments.RequestConfirmed: An tabbatar da bukatar neman mukami
appointments.VerificationRequestSent: An aika da nasarar tabbatar da alƙawari
appointments.VerificationRequestCompleted: An tabbatar da bukatar tabbatarwar nadinku
appointments.VerificationRequestRejected: An ƙi karɓar buƙatar tabbatarwar nadinku
appointments.VerificationRenewRequestCompleted: An tabbatar da bukatar sabuntawar nadinku
appointments.VerificationRenewRequestRejected: An ƙi karɓar buƙatar sabuntawar nadinku
appointments.AppointmentRequestedText: An nemi alƙawari Tabbatar za a karɓa a cikin minutesan mintoci kaɗan zuwa hoursan awanni.
appointments.AppointmentTentativelyConfirmedText: An tabbatar da nadin alƙawarinku na ɗan lokaci amma har yanzu baku shirya tsaf don aiwatar da alƙawarinku ba.
appointments.AppointmentConfirmedText: An tabbatar da alƙawarin naku kuma an saita kwanan wata da lokaci. Kuna shirye don zuwa kuma tabbatar da halartar cikin lokaci!
appointments.AppointmentDevicePreparationWindow: Domin bawa na'urarka damar shiryawa wajan ganawa daidai, dolene ka shiga koda sau daya ne a yayin taga kasa da kasa:
appointments.AppointmentVerificationRequestedText: An aika da bukatar tabbatarwar alƙawarinku. Za a karɓi tabbaci tsakanin aan mintoci kaɗan zuwa fewan awanni bayan ƙarshen taga lokacin tabbatarwa da aka nuna a ƙasa.
appointments.AppointmentVerificationRequestedExpiredR: Neman tabbatarwar nadinku ya kare. Kuna iya ci gaba da ɗan jira kadan idan kuna so, ko za ku iya sake saita aikin alƙawarin kuma fara farawa ta latsa maɓallin sake saiti a ƙasa.
appointments.AppointmentVerificationCompletedText: An tabbatar da bukatar sabuntawar nadinku Kuna iya ci gaba da amfani da asusunka na asali har zuwa lokacin da za a sake sabuntawa.
appointments.AppointmentVerificationCompletedCanPubli: An tabbatar da bukatar tabbatarwar nadinku Yanzu zaku iya ci gaba da buga asusunka zuwa ga toshewar.
appointments.AppointmentVerificationRejectedText: An ƙi karɓar buƙatar tabbatarwar nadinku Da fatan a sake gwadawa tare da neman sabon alƙawari.
appointments.AppointmentVerificationWindow: Yakamata a tabbatar alƙawarinku a cikin taga
appointments.InvalidPuzzleEngineVersion: Versionaukin injin ɗin wasan bai dace ba. Da fatan za a sabunta sigar kayan aikin ku.
appointments.FailedClearAppointment: Ba a yi nasarar share alƙawari ba
appointments.TimesInUTC: Nuna Tsarin Lokaci a cikin UTC

puzzles.Title: Wasin wasa
puzzles.TimeBeforeAppointment: Zamu fara zamanka na wuyar fahimta, da fatan za a kasance a tsaye. Kimanin lokacin da ya rage kafin fara alƙawarinku
puzzles.WaitingForPuzzle: da wuyar warwarewa zaman ya kamata fara kowane lokaci a yanzu. A halin yanzu jiran umarnin wuyar warwarewa ...
puzzles.TimeRemaining: Lokaci ya rage don kammala wuyar warwarewa (s)
puzzles.CompletedAndSend: Puwarewar ku (s) an kammala ta cikin nasara. Da fatan za a jira yayin da ake aiwatar da sakamako. Wannan na iya ɗaukar ko'ina daga fewan mintoci kaɗan zuwa hoursan awanni.
puzzles.PreparingPackage: Da fatan za a jira yayin da alƙawarin ya kammala, an tattara sakamakon kuma an aika su don tabbatarwa.

ths.Title: Lokacin Hard Sa hannu Generation
ths.Introduction: Ana shirya don bincika ƙimar sirrin darajar sirri
ths.TimeHardSignatureNonceSearch: Lokaci Mai Sa hannu sa hannu bincike

sms.Title: Tabbatar SMS
sms.ConfirmationCodeHint: Lambar tabbatarwa da kuka iya samu daga tsarin alƙawarin.
sms.PhoneNumberHint: Lambar waya inda zaku karɓi saƙon SMS.
sms.SmsCodeHint: Lambar tabbatarwa wacce kuka karba ta sakon SMS.
sms.IntroductionText: Anan zamu tabbatar da asusunka ta amfani da lambar waya mai inganci.
sms.InvalidChineseConfiguration: A China, saboda mawuyacin aika saƙon SMS, dole ne a fara samar da lambar Tabbatar da Tabbatarwa.
sms.ResultsSuccess: Tabbatarwar nasara ce! asusunka na Id yanzu an tabbatar da shi ta wayar.
sms.ResultsFailure: Tabbatarwar ta gaza. Kuna iya sake gwadawa cikin awanni 24.
sms.EnsurePhoneNumber: Ci gaba da tabbatarwa don lambar waya

accountPublication.AccountPublicationProcessExplanation: Kafin kowane aiwatar da ayyukan a cikin blockchain, asusunku dole ne a gabatar da shi ga jama'a. Za a tabbatar da asusunka, kuma zai kasance a shirye don yin aiki da zarar an tabbatar a cikin toshe.
accountPublication.AccountPublicationFailed: An sami kuskure yayin buga asusun. Bugawar jama'a ta kasa.
accountPublication.CanCloseWindow: Yanzu zaku iya rufe wannan taga lafiya yayin da kuke jira don tabbatarwa ta zo.
accountPublication.NeedBlockchainSynced: Blockchain yana buƙatar aiki tare don buga lissafi.
accountPublication.NeedPeerToPublish: Babu isasshen takamaiman da aka haɗa don fara lissafi.
accountPublication.WaitingForConfirmation: Jiran tabbatarwa a wani toshe mai zuwa.
accountPublication.CannotPublishAccount: Ba shi yiwuwa a buga asusu

app.PleaseEnterYourPassphrase: Da fatan za a shigar da Kalmar wucewa
app.PleaseEnterYourPassphraseAgain: Da fatan za a sake shigar da kalmar wucewa
app.PleaseEnterYourPassphraseLastAttempt: Da fatan za a shigar da Passphrase ɗinku na ƙarshe
app.PleaseCopyYourKeyFile: Da fatan za a kwafa keyfile ɗinku a cikin walat ɗinku.
app.TermsOfServiceCheck: Duba anan don nuna cewa kun karanta kuma kun yarda da sharuɗɗan sabis.
app.TermsOfServiceClick: Ta danna Ee da / ko ta amfani da wannan software kun yarda da sharuɗɗan sabis
app.ServerRunningStop: A halin yanzu uwar garken Neuralium kumburi tana gudana. Kuna so ku dakatar da shi?
app.ImportantWalletUpdate: Walat ɗin ku ya sami sabon sabuntawa kamar maɓallin canji. Yana da kyau a daɗa ɗaukar sabon madadin walat a yanzu, saboda tsofaffin walat na baya bazai iya amfani da su sosai daga yanzu ba.
app.UpdateWallet: Ana samun sabon salo na software ɗin walat. Da fatan za a sabunta yanzu.

Alerts.Message1: Block yana da ma'amala wanda namu ne amma BA a cikin maɓallin keɓaɓɓiyarmu ba. Muna iya samun tsohuwar walat.
Alerts.Message2: Jerin maɓallin ma'amala na ƙarshe wanda aka daidaita ya ƙasa da ƙimar cikin walat ɗinmu. Muna iya samun lalatattun walat kuma ba za mu iya amfani da shi lami lafiya.
Alerts.Message3: Jerin maɓallin ma'amala na ƙarshe wanda aka daidaita shine mafi girma fiye da ƙimar cikin walat ɗinmu. Wataƙila muna da walat na zamani kuma ba za mu iya amfani da shi lafiya ba.
Alerts.Message4: Tsayin maɓallinku ƙasa da tsayin amfani da maɓallin kewayawa. Wannan lamari ne mai matukar muhimmancin tsaro. Kuna iya amfani da tsofaffin kwafin walat ɗin ku na yau da kullun.

Messages.Message1: Sabon abin da aka karɓa ba shi da mahallin zaɓe kuma ba zai gudanar da zaɓe ba. Babu damar hakar ma'adinai a cikin toshe ta yanzu.

contact.AddContactExplanation: Sanya wani lamba ta shigar da ID na asusun su da sunan mai amfani.
contact.AlreadyExists: Adireshin {{suna}} ya riga ya kasance tare da wannan ID {{{id}}}
contact.PleaseConfirmDeletionOfContact: Da fatan za a tabbatar an goge lamba
contact.Title: Adiresoshi
contact.Explain: Abokanka da lambobin asusun su don samun damar sauri.

dashboard.Title: Dandalin
dashboard.Explain: Babban maɓallin ra'ayi akan blockchain da asusunku (s).

error.InformationsNotCorrectPleaseRetry: Bayanai ba daidai bane. Don Allah a sake gwadawa

event.MiningPrimeElectedMissed: Ba a zabe mu ba daga mazabu:

history.Title: Ma'amaloli
history.Explain: Tarihin ma'amala ku tare da cikakkun bayanai na fasaha game da tsarinsu na ciki

mining.NotCurrentlyMining: Ba a Mining Ba A Yanzu
mining.ExplainInfoPanel: Bambance-bambance masu amfani da yawa game da ma'adinanku
mining.Explain: Anan zaka iya sanya kwamfutarka aiki ta hanyar sanya shi yayi wasan kwaikwayo na lissafi don buše sabon Neuraliums.
mining.Miningportalert: Lura: Domin nawa, tashar TCP ɗin ku yakamata ta haɗa sauran nodes akan p2p. Musayar shine madaidaicin ƙa'ida akan p2p. Idan kuna son nawa a cikin bututun ma'adinai na biyu da na farko, tashar jiragen ruwa dole ne a haɗa ta in ba haka ba kumburi ba zai taɓa samun ma'amalar da za ta zama ba. Da fatan za a tabbatar cewa an buɗe makwannin wuta kuma a kunna isar da tashar.
mining.SecondTier: Mining a cikin kashi na biyu
mining.StatisticsSessionDescription: Isticsididdiga a cikin zaman ma'adinai na yanzu
mining.ConfirmClearCachedCredentials: Shin ya kamata a share bayanan sharar hakar ma'adanan? (wannan na iya shafar aikin mara kyau kuma ba da shawarar shi)
mining.CachedCredentialsCleared: An yi nasarar share bayanan shaidodin nasara
mining.CachedCredentialsFailed: Share bayanan shaidodin da aka adana sun kasa
mining.PortNotConnectableCantMine: Domin nawa a cikin matakan 1 ko na 2, tashar jiragen ruwan p2p ɗinku dole a haɗa. Ba za a iya kunna ma'adinai kamar yadda yake ba. Idan ba za ku iya bude tashar jiragen ruwa ba, to sai a saita ma'adanai su yi aiki a matakin na 3.

neuralium.NoTransaction: Babu ma'amala da aka samo don wannan abun kan lokaci.
neuralium.Title: Neuraliums
neuralium.Explain: Duk abin da ya shafi Neuraliums a cikin asusunku

send.CantSend: Ba za a iya aiko da ma'amala ba. Babu isasshen aboki da aka haɗa.
send.NoAccountOrAccountNotActiveOrNotPublishe: Babu asusun ajiya, asusu ba aiki ko kuma ba'a buga shi ba
send.NotEnoughNeuraliums: Babu isasshen Neuraliums don cika ma'amala
send.PleaseChooseContactInTheListOrInputConta: Da fatan za a zabi lamba daga jerin ko adireshin lambar shigarwar
send.PleaseConfirmSending: Da fatan za a tabbatar da aikawa
send.PleaseInputNeuraliumAmount: Da fatan za a shigar da daidai adadin Neuralium
send.SendingValueConfirmationAndTip: {{neuraliums}} IUM don yin asusu {{id}} tare da {{tip}} IUM a cikin tukwici.
send.SendingValueConfirmationWithNameAndTip: {{neuraliums}} IUM zuwa {{name}} (asusu {{id}}) tare da {{tip}} IUM a cikin tukwici.
send.Title: Aika
send.TransactionError: Kuskure ya faru don aika ma'amala. Lambobin kuskure:
send.PresentationAccountId: Ba za a iya aika alamu zuwa asusun gabatarwa ba
send.NotesDescription: Wani zaɓi na zaɓi wanda za a adana a cikin bayanan sirri kawai.

server.CheckingServer: Da fatan za a jira yayin da muke tabbatarwa idan akwai sabar aiki mai aiki ...
server.NoActiveServer: Ba a sami uwar garke mai gudu ba.
server.NotConnectedToServer: Ba a haɗa uwar garke ba.
server.ExternallyStarted: Ba za a iya dakatar da uwar garken da ke waje ba
server.Title: Sabis
server.Explain: Taga taga don masu amfani da ci gaba wanda ke ba da damar sarrafa uwar garken Neuralium.

settings.Title: Saiti
settings.Explain: Zaɓuɓɓuka da yawa waɗanda zaka iya saitawa zuwa walat ɗin walat ɗin.

tools.Title: Kayan aiki
tools.Explain: Kayan aiki masu amfani don taimakawa haɓaka kwarewar Neuralium.

utilities.TestP2pPort: Gwajin ɗan'uwana zuwa tashar jiragen ruwa ta tsara
utilities.PortToTest: Da fatan za a zaɓi tashar jiragen ruwa don gwadawa
utilities.ValidationHttpPort: Alkawarin Tabbatar da Alkawarin Http Ajiyayyen tashar
utilities.TestCallback: Gwada tashar tashar uwar garke ma
utilities.ResultConnectionSuccess: Haɗin tashar jirgin ruwa ya yi nasara.
utilities.ResultConnectionFailed: Haɗin tashar jirgin ruwa ya faskara
utilities.CallbackRequested: An buƙaci haɗin haɗin kan sabarmu
utilities.CallbackAttempted: Sabis na nesa yayi ƙoƙari ya haɗi zuwa tasharmu ta gida.
utilities.ResultCallbackDidNotHappen: Uwar garken nesa ba ta iya amsawa.
utilities.RemainingSeconds: dakika kafin wani yunƙuri ya yiwu.

testMode.ParagrahOne: A halin yanzu kuna cikin yanayin TESTNET. An tsara nau'in testnet don gwaji tare da sababbin abubuwan da ƙila za su iya ko ba su aiki kamar yadda aka yi niyya. Kuna iya ba da rahoton duk wasu kwari, matsaloli ko shawarwari da zaku iya samu akan mafita namu.
testMode.ParagrahTwo: A cikin yanayin TESTNET, kowane alamun alamun neuralium da aka samu don dalilai na gwaji ne kawai kuma maiyuwa baza a iya amfani dashi a cikin hanyar samar da cibiyar sadarwar 'MainNet' ba. Alamar da aka samu a yanayin TESTNET na iya rasa ko a sake saita su a kowane lokaci ba tare da sanarwar farko ba.
testMode.Warning: Ramin da walat a halin yanzu suna cikin Yanayin TestNet akan wata hanyar sadarwa daban.
testMode.Period: Wannan ginin TESTNET yana aiki har zuwa Oktoba 9th 2020.

wallet.UserAccountDescription: Walat ɗin mai amfani an yi shi ne don amfanin gaba ɗaya. Yana ba da damar zuwa hakar ma'adinai na 3 da na 4 kuma raba shingen ba a tilasta shi amma ana ba da shawarar.
wallet.ServerAccountDescription: An tsara walat ɗin Sabis don masu amfani da ci gaba. Ana buƙatar saitin sabar mai aiki da raba shinge wanda ke ba da damar zuwa ma'adinan bene na 1 da na 2.
wallet.WalletEncryptedByNotKeys: GARGADI NA TSARO: An saita walat ɗinku a ɓoye, amma ba mabuɗanku ba. Da fatan za a tabbatar da cewa wannan shine ainihin abin da kuke son yi.
wallet.KeysEncryptedByNotWallet: GARGADI NA TSARO: An saita mabuɗanku don rufaffen, amma ba walat ɗin ku. Da fatan za a tabbatar da cewa wannan shine ainihin abin da kuke son yi.
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfAllKeys: Kalmar wucewa don ɓoyayyen dukkan maɓallan
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfValidatorSecret: Kalmar wucewa don ɓoyayyen Super Key
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfValidatorVerifi: Kalmar wucewa don ɓoyayyen Super Key
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfBackupKey: Kalmar wucewa don ɓoyayyen Super Key
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfChangeKey: Kalmar wucewa don ɓoyayyen Maɓallin Canji
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfMessageKey: Kalmar wucewa don ɓoye maɓallin Saƙo
wallet.PassphraseForEncryptionOfTransactionKey: Kalmar wucewa don ɓoye maɓallin ma'amala
wallet.PleaseCreateOrCopy: Airƙiri sabon walat ko loda mai da ke gudana.
wallet.WalletWaitMessage: Yanzu muna ƙirƙirar asusunka da maɓallan tsaro. Wannan na iya ɗaukar mintuna da yawa. Na gode da hakurin da ka yi.
wallet.Completed: An kirkiro walat ɗin ku cikin nasara. Yanzu kamar yadda mataki na gaba, muna bada shawara mai karfi cewa kayi wani ajiyar tsaro na babban fayil ɗin walat ɗinku. Haka nan muna bada shawara sosai cewa ka cire babbar maɓallin ta babban fayil ɗin asusunka kuma adana shi a cikin wani tsari a waje da kwamfutarka.
wallet.WalletPath: Kuna iya gano sabon walat ɗin ku a cikin hanyar da ke gaba
